detail_desc: Long-sleeved dress in jersey with a supersoft, brushed finish. Small embroidered detail at the top and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative, twisted cord bow and tassels.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, fine-knit organic pointelle cotton with a round neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Alice band with an appliqué decoration on top.
Alice band with an appliqué decoration on top.
Short dress in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons on one shoulder and decorative buttons on the other. 3/4-length sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Top in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with decorative buttons on the shoulders, short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Top in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with decorative buttons on the shoulders, short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Short, fitted dress in a patterned viscose weave with a gentle V-neck, narrow, frill-trimmed shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Shorts in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.
Shorts in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.
5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch cotton denim with a zip fly, slit at the front and raw-edge hem.
5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch cotton denim with a zip fly, slit at the front and raw-edge hem.
5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch cotton denim with a zip fly, slit at the front and raw-edge hem.
Sleeveless top in airy linen jersey with a deep V-neck at the back.
Sleeveless top in airy linen jersey with a deep V-neck at the back.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit wool blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless top in pleated jersey with a frilled collar, opening with shiny buttons at the back of the neck, short butterfly sleeves with overlocked edges and a laser-cut hem.
Fitted cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Fitted cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with narrow cuffs.

Dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short, elasticated sleeves. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Ankle-length pull on-trousers in a patterned viscose weave. High waist with wide elastication at the back and pleats at the front, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Ankle-length pull on-trousers in a patterned viscose weave. High waist with wide elastication at the back and pleats at the front, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Ankle-length pull on-trousers in a patterned viscose weave. High waist with wide elastication at the back and pleats at the front, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Chinos in a cotton weave with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Chinos in a cotton weave with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Chinos in a cotton weave with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.

Soft, non-wired bras in ribbed cotton jersey with unlined triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, narrow elastication at the back and no fasteners.
Boxy jumper in a soft, fluffy rib knit with a polo neck and low dropped shoulders.
Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in a soft organic cotton knit. Jumper with buttons down one side and long raglan sleeves. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.

Short, A-line skirt in washed denim with a zip fly and button, a coin pocket, front pockets, flap side pockets and a raw-edge hem. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Gloves in supple leather with ribbed cuffs. Lined in a soft wool blend.
Gloves in supple leather with ribbed cuffs. Lined in a soft wool blend.
Short dress in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, short sleeves and a seam at the waist with decorative ties at the front.
Tube scarf in a soft jacquard knit.
Tube scarf in a soft jacquard knit.
Hat in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with a pompom on top and earflaps with ties. Fleece lining.
Hat in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with a pompom on top and earflaps with ties. Fleece lining.
Jacket in supersoft faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Jacket in supersoft faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Lined.

Set with a shirt, cardigan and bow tie. Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Fine-knit cardigan in soft cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in slub-knit organic cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Jacquard-knit pattern at the cuffs and hem.
Short, flared dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elastication with a small frill trim at the top and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft viscose jersey with a deep neckline at the back, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs.
Cardigan in a soft, loose-knit viscose blend with long sleeves and no buttons at the front.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer and rounded at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Tights in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the tights is organic.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Boxy, slightly shorter jacket in organic cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and flap chest pockets with a button.

Checked suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband with hook-and-eye fasteners, and a zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, and jetted back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
